items.content_html: A lightweight and customizable stepper component for React Native, built on top of @gorhom/bottom-sheet. Easily manage multi-step flows in a modal bottom sheet with smooth animations and full control.

items.content_html: A lightweight 3D web-based multiplayer starter kit using Three.js, React, and SpacetimeDB. Build interactive multiplayer experiences with real-time synchronization, character movement, and customizable game mechanics.

items.content_html: A lightweight, flexible JSON-based database designed for simplicity and performance. FlexiDB supports in-memory caching, asynchronous operations, customizable data storage, automatic backups, and atomic transactions.

items.content_html: DivCopy is a lightweight browser extension that helps frontend developers quickly inspect, copy, and reuse web elements.
items.title: ajstyle4u/DivCopy: DivCopy is a lightweight browser extension that helps frontend developers quickly inspect, copy, and reuse web elements.

items.content_html: got-scraping-client is a lightweight and efficient tool for web scraping tasks using the popular Got HTTP client. It simplifies data extraction from web pages by providing a straightforward API and built-in support for handling common challenges like pagination and rate limiting.
items.title: sazzadhossainmilon/got-scraping-client: got-scraping-client is a lightweight and efficient tool for web scraping tasks using the popular Got HTTP client. It simplifies data extraction from web pages by providing a straightforward API and built-in support for handling common challenges like pagination and rate limiting.

items.content_html: Peek is a lightweight WebRTC-based screen sharing app built with vanilla JS, Node.js, and Tailwind CSS. It lets users share their screen in real-time over a unique session link, with optional stream quality controls.
items.title: theveug/peek: Peek is a lightweight WebRTC-based screen sharing app built with vanilla JS, Node.js, and Tailwind CSS. It lets users share their screen in real-time over a unique session link, with optional stream quality controls.

items.content_html: A lightweight, high-performance UI toolkit for terminal and browser consoles. Create beautiful styled outputs with zero performance impact. ConsoleUI provides styling, colors, boxes, tables, spinners, and trees in a single tree-shakable package with zero dependencies, ensuring consistent results across all environments.
items.title: fvena/consoleUI: A lightweight, high-performance UI toolkit for terminal and browser consoles. Create beautiful styled outputs with zero performance impact. ConsoleUI provides styling, colors, boxes, tables, spinners, and trees in a single tree-shakable package with zero dependencies, ensuring consistent results across all environments.

items.content_html: Lightweight typescript library for cross-chain wallets. Connect with multiple blockchains via a common interface, with support for the minimum features necessary.
items.title: xchainjs/xchainjs-lib: Lightweight typescript library for cross-chain wallets. Connect with multiple blockchains via a common interface, with support for the minimum features necessary.
